text: I did not like the recipes used by the two previous pizza shops located here. I was a little leary about ordering. So happy to report that they are using their own recipes. The dough is really good. We will definitely be ordering from here again!
Food is good but if I request something then make it happen ... I can cook myself ... but damn ...,give me what I want if i request it ...,It's just a topping n i'm willing to pay !!!!
Real good pizza . i think i found a new favorite pizza place! I will be back every time i am in the area
